headline: 3 Cheap Tech Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Shares of Alphabet, Dell Technologies, and Verizon Communications are trading at discounted valuations.  The stock market has staged an impressive rebound following a volatile past few months.  Easing trade tensions, driven by the Trump administration's pullbacks on most of its "reciprocal" tariffs, has helped restore some level of investor confidence in the corporate earnings outlook.

headline: If I Had To Start Over, This Is How I'd Invest My First $100,000
summary: A 50/50 split between ETFs and top stocks balances income, growth, and risk in a long-term strategy. Learn why this portfolio approach is built to compound.
